# wholeSymbol

**Instance Property**

An effect that makes all layers disappear simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
var wholeSymbol: DisappearSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **byLayer**: An effect that makes each layer disappear separately.
